name: GetGoalRelationships
description:
Retrieve compact goal relationship records from Asana.

Call this tool to get information on goal relationships within an Asana workspace. It provides a compact view of the connections between goals, which may be useful for tracking progress or understanding hierarchy.

value_schema.description:
